Name: Silver-haired Echo Trainer - III
Description: Grandpa Jingzhu finally reveals the ultimate secret to training Echoes...! Will he finally get what he wants this time?
QuestDesc: Grandpa Jingzhu finally reveals the ultimate secret to training Echoes...! Will he finally get what he wants this time?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, finally arrived. It’s just around the corner.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry, but I must take a brief rest. I’m relying on you, young ones!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Strange. It’s unusual for Linghan to not be outside soaking up the sun at this hour. Could she be indoors?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No response...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Something's not right. Linghan typically avoids venturing out too far as her memory isn't as sharp as it once was...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah, I’ve got a weird vibe too. Let’s ask around the neighborhood.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Count on me! I practically know this area like the back of my hand. I’ll go ask everyone I can find to see if they’ve spotted Grandma Linghan.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This place is seriously dangerous. Grandma Linghan isn’t in a good health condition. Why would she come here...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She must be here to collect the Echo of Flautist. After all, today is... a special day.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Many years ago on this very day, Jinzhou was besieged by a fierce Tacet Discord outbreak. Tens of Midnight Rangers stood firm on the front lines, confronting thousands of Tacet Discords.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It was Linghan who proposed a brilliant strategy. With her deep understanding of Echoes, she suggested utilizing them to repel the enemies’ assault.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To minimize casualties, she led the entire squad here to gather hundreds of Flautist’s Echoes.

Options.PlotLineKey: She was also a Midnight Ranger?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, isn't that person with the silver hair over there...? Grandma Linghan! GRANDMA LINGHAN! Over here!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Darn! She’s too far away to hear us!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No! The Tacet Discords are closing in on her!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, man! We can’t even use overdashing to catch up from this distance!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Leave it to me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Frostbite Tortoise, I choose you! Protect Linghan!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Phew! That was a close call!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your observation is sharp, young one. You have the makings of a soldier. Now is the moment to strike! Seize the opportunity given by the lull in Flautist’s attacks!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let’s go!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Phew... Finally safe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Young ones, are you alright?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: W-We’re fine! Just needed to catch our breath after that crazy moment...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Instead of worrying us, go make sure Grandma Linghan’s okay!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Linghan, how are you feeling? Any injuries? Does it hurt?

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your Echo is Frostbite Tortoise, isn’t it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You’ve raised it well, and the timing couldn’t be more perfect.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Linghan...

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Seeing your Echo reminds me of my dear...

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He shielded our entire squad with a humble Frostbite Tortoise, time and time again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: At first, everyone mocked him for choosing such a seemingly feeble Echo. Yet, they were all silenced by its might in the end.

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After all, the strength of an Echo lies in the hands of its user.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see. My judgment was clouded by strength before, capturing Echoes purely based on their appearances. You're right. You're always right.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Grandpa Jingzhu, why are you crying?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: These tears... They’re tears of joy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By the way, there’s a striking resemblance between you and my dear...

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Both with a nose and two eyes, quite similar indeed, hehe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But you’re nowhere near as handsome as him. In my eyes, he was incomparable—wise and brave beyond measure.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Y-Your cataracts seem to be worsening...

Options.PlotLineKey: Hurry up! Get her reacquainted with you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You’re right! Captain Linghan, it’s a pleasure to make your acquaintance. Allow me to introduce myself. I’m a member of the Vanguard of Midnight Rangers. You can call me Jingzhu.

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jingzhu... Did you just have flowers with you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh yeah! I was too busy dealing with the Tacet Discords, and I dropped them somewhere.

Options.PlotLineKey: Let me get them for you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They’re right here. Let’s take them back to Grandpa Jingzhu!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey! You’re all here!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When I heard Grandpa Jingzhu needed a hand, I zipped over here using my amazing overdashing skill!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No need to hurry. Take a moment to catch your breath, young one.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No worries, I’m bursting with energy! So, Grandpa Jingzhu, what’s the plan?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright. I must say, {PlayerName}’s suggestion seems quite practical. Find a subject that piques her interest and proceed gradually...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, I’ve devised a plan to enhance the Echo. Once we make the Scythes stronger, I’ll be ready to present it to her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah, what else can we do? The Scythes is already pretty impressive. Can we kick it up a notch?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me share a little secret with you. There’s another valuable asset in Tacet Fields... known as Tuners!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tuners?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, Tuners have the ability to fine-tune the frequencies of Echoes, eliminating any unwanted noise and bolstering their strength!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, right! It’s that round or square thing, isn’t it? How could I forget?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our goal for today is to acquire some Tuners from Tacet Fields.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Great! For stronger Echoes! Let’s get moving!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Shaohua, have you seen Grandma Linghan today?

Dialogues.Speaker: Shaohua
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You mean the old lady next door?

Dialogues.Speaker: Shaohua
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It seems she went out early this morning.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shaohua
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Isn’t it strange? I heard she’s been quite unwell lately, hardly ever venturing outside. Instead, she spends hours basking in the sun right by her doorstep.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shaohua
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But she went straight out today, and I have no idea where she went.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Got it, thanks for letting me know. I’ll check with someone else and see if I can dig up more info.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello, may I ask your name?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lanqing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello, I’m Lanqing. I just moved in. Are you a Patroller? Anything happened around here?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, mind if I ask you something? Have you seen Grandma Linghan around today?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lanqing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're talking about the lady who's into Echoes, right? I haven't spotted her around today, unfortunately.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lanqing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I’ve crossed paths with her a couple of times. She seems nice.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lanqing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But she always looks a bit under the weather, and her memory seems a bit shaky.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lanqing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I heard she’s dealing with some serious health issues. It must be tough for her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *Sobbing* Grandpa! Finally had someone to help! We were so scared...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here, this Noctemint is for you. Please accept it, Linghan. Will you once again be my lifelong companion?

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, the scent of Noctemint... it’s so familiar. My dear used to bring me Noctemints. Just a whiff would lift my spirits.

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Flowers, Echoes... they’re all the same. Practicality is key.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Y-Yes! From this moment onward, I’ll be by your side, soaking in the sunshine, engaging in conversation... Whatever you desire, I’ll be there with you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As long as I can be by your side!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Because I made a promise to you, Linghan. I vowed to never let you be alone, and I intend to uphold that promise for eternity.

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But alas, we can’t soak up the sun here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Escort me back. Basking in the sun on my doorstep is where I feel most at ease.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, alright, let’s go home!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Grandpa Jingzhu, where is Grandma Linghan?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Linghan isn’t in a good health condition, so I’ve let her return to rest for now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Such a relief to hear that! I’m so glad she got home safe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, and by the way, I’ve got a ton of questions. {PlayerName}, you too, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You might have noticed already: Linghan was once an exceptional Midnight Ranger, serving as the captain of the Vanguard.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She wasn’t just my captain; she's also my beloved wife, with whom I’ve shared many years...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Being captain, she had a lot on her plate, always leading the charge, protecting our squad, and teaching us survival skills.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As the battles escalated, she pushed herself beyond limits and suffered grave injuries.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After a major victory, she eventually fell ill. She started to feel mentally foggy, causing her memories to slowly fade away.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She forgot how to navigate the streets of Jinzhou, forgot to eat her favorite Helmet Flatbread while they were still warm, and then...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She even forgot about me...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, that’s why you’ve been chasing after Grandma Linghan, huh?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You’re hoping to stick by her side as her special someone.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, you’re correct. Our comrades, once vibrant youths, perished in battle, while others succumbed to illness.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can’t help but fear that someday if she were to regain her memories, she’d feel a profound loneliness... I cannot bear the thought.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry for bringing up sad things. Thank you for helping me find Linghan.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Linghan has accepted me. It’s a great joy! I should feel happy!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The past is the past. From now on, I’ll treasure every moment shared with Linghan!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Exactly! Let’s treasure every moment and live life to the max!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, if you have time, feel free to visit us, and we can chat about Echoes to our heart’s content.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can’t express my gratitude enough for your assistance in resolving this matter.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Plus, seeing you must have made Linghan so relieved to know that the people we risked our lives for have turned into amazing adults.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you for your efforts. Here are what you deserve.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Besides the compensation, this old man has a word of advice for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Take good care of your Echoes. The world beyond can be perilous, and they may come in handy in times of need.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To safeguard yourselves and those dear to you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm, not bad. You’ve stirred up memories of my past glory.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Linghan should be delighted to see this, don’t you think?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let’s hurry back to show her!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whoa, this new tech is amazing! We found her in no time flat.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let’s not dawdle. Hang tight, Linghan! We’re on our way!
